result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Case calendared for Plea and Sentencing this date.  Court in trial on another matter.  Parties agree via email to November 9, 2022 at 1:30 pm.  Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 34, Judge Yamahiro in Room 423 of the Safety Building.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.  bm
Ineligible Voting Notice & Acknowledgement received and filed.  bm
Jury Instructions received and filed.  bm
Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum to Plea received and filed.  bm

Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly in court with attorney Nathan Francis Opland-Dobs.  Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly in custody.  Ken Olstinski for Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Scheduling Conference held.  Defense requests a plea and sentencing date.  
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
All previous conditions of bail to remain the same including the 24 hour curfew with the exception of attorney visits and verified medical appointments.

Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly in court with attorney Nathan Francis Opland-Dobs.  Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly in custody.  Student Intern Jessica Bormingham under the supervision of Assistant District Attorney Erin Karshen for Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Case calendared for Bail/Bond Hearing and Scheduling Conference this date.    Bail motion by defense argued and granted by the Court.  Defense requests adjourned Scheduling Conference date.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Nathan Francis Opland-Dobs in court, defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly not in court, in custody.  Erin Karshen for Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
Case calendared for Scheduling Conference this date.  Defense requests adjourned scheduling and bail hearing date as he is in trial in another court.  
  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Motion to Review Bail.  Received and Filed.  nk

Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly in court with Attorney Robert Hampton who appeared on behalf of Attorney Nathan Francis Opland-Dobs; parties appear by video.  Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 12, Judge David Borowski. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial.  Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 12.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Motion to Dismiss.  (Wolfgang A. Stanly - #2022002877, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
Defendant's Motion for Production of Discovery.  (Wolfgang A. Stanly - #2022002877, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).
STATE PUBLIC DEFENDER - ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL.  Received and Filed.  nk

Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly in court, in custody, pro se.  Kathryn Ginsberg for Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: nk
Case in Court for Hearing.  Page Styler advices the Court that Attorney Nathan Opland-Dobs will be appointed to represent the Defendant.  Case remains calendared for Preliminary Hearing June 1, 2022, at 8:30 am., in Prelim.

Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly not in court, defendant in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a State V. Lee Hearing in the trial court.  Hearing scheduled for May 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly not in court, defendant in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsinn, via zoom.  Deputy Court Clerk: STW 
CASE HELD VIA ZOOM AND LIVE STREAM ON DA CAST. Case set for Preliminary hearing. Public Defender's office request additional time to appoint counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly not in court, defendant in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD has not appointed consel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5 with electronic monitoring; no contact order.  If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, Defendant to remain in custody until a device becomes available.  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Court ordered no contact with J.E.S ; K.J.S AND K.M.S
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly in court with attorney Michael J Cerniglia.  Defendant Wolfgang Andrew Stanly in custody.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Wolfgang Andrew Stanly appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Borowski, Branch 12. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch 12. Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
